Pragati Corner
Conscious Colours,  
Recognising the ecological footprint of conventional dyes, we are 
pioneering the shift to azo-free, eco-friendly dye recipes, ushering in a 
new era of sustainable Indian dresswear. Our curated collection of vegan 
sarees is not just a style statement but a conscious call, empowering 
consumers to choose fashion rooted in ethics and environmental care. 
Collaborating with industry veterans, we are refining weaving and 
dyeing practices, driving standardisation, and uplifting traditional crafts 
people, preserving heritage while paving the way for a greener future.
